title: 127 Hours: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
description: The international bestseller Between a Rock and a Hard Place is now a major motion picture starring James Franco.Hiking into the remote Utah canyonlands, Aron Ralston felt perfectly at home in the beauty of the natural world. Then, at 2:41 P.M., eight miles from his truck, in a deep and narrow slot canyon, an eight-hundred-pound boulder tumbled loose, pinning Aron's right hand and wrist against the canyon wall. Through six days of hell, with scant water, food, or warm clothing, and the terrible knowledge that no one knew where he was, Aron eliminated his escape option one by one. Then a moment of stark clarity helped him to solve the riddle of the boulder--and commit one of the most extreme and desperate acts imaginable.Honest, inspiring, and undeniably astonishing , 127 Between a Rock and a Hard Place has taken its place in the annals of classic adventure stories.
author: Aron Ralston
